channel.title: Need Players to Establish A Connection
channel.description: How do I get my players to establish a connection? Because when they log off they have to wait all over again to establish one so they can log back on.

item.title: Need Players to Establish A Connection
item.dc:creator: @uber_leet uber leet
item.description:
@uber_leet wrote:

Sounds like your client isnt disconnecting them when they log off. I wouldnâ€™t know exactly what to do in that situation, but this post may spur some other persons ideas as to sorting the problem out. Hope it helps.

Wetton.
